document.title: SP487-B-Taking Care of the Parent

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: Have you ever had a day when everything went wrong? Bad days make it hard to be patient and loving. A tired, frustrated, angry person is not likely to be a good parent. This publication is intended to help you deal with stress so that you can be a more peaceful person and a more effective parent. We suggest that you take the time to do the exercises throughout this publication. That way, youâ€™ll be making your personal plan to replace the stress in your life with peace.
